main: ^As you continue down the street, you notice a crowd gathering at a small park. As you drive closer, you see it appears to be some sort of abolitionist rally, with a stage and everything. The speaker is impassioned, but the crowd seems... reluctant. Perhaps this is a good opportunity to speak your mind...

c-0: ^You take to the podium, espousing how the Inhibition Act robs the people of Flatiron City- and the United Territories- of their freedoms. The crowd murmurs...
c-1: ^You start vehemently attacking the opposing speaker and their allies, criticizing their appearance, superficial morals, prudishness and cold demeanor. The crowd murmurs...
c-2: ^You get on stage and pull out your weapon, firing into the air. The organized crowd becomes a mob in seconds, some scrambling to get away, others moving to intercept you. In the chaos, you're able to grab a few purses! (+25 Cash)

success: ^The crowd hears your words and begins to chant "Booze! Booze! Booze!" The abolitionists hightail it out of there.
failure: ^The crowd becomes restless, opinion turning on you. The Abolitionist speaker smiles then yells "Get 'em!"
